verses.text:
When the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, whose \w land|strong="H0776"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee, and thou \w succeedest|strong="H3423"\w* them, and \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and in their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*;  +  r 19.1  t succeedest: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest *

Thou shalt \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for thee in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

Thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* thee a \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and divide the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* giveth thee to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w*, into three \w parts|strong="H8027"\w*, that every \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w* may \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither.

¶ And this \add is\add* the \w case|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w slayer|strong="H7523"\w*, which shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* thither, that he may \w live|strong="H2425"\w*: Whoso \w killeth|strong="H5221"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* \w ignorantly|strong="H1097"\w*, whom he \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* not in \w time|strong="H8543"\w* \w past|strong="H8032"\w*;\f + \fr 19.4 \ft in…: Heb. from yesterday the third day\f*

As when a man \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w wood|strong="H3293"\w* with his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* to \w hew|strong="H2404"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, and his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* fetcheth a \w stroke|strong="H5080"\w* with the \w axe|strong="H1631"\w* to cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and the \w head|strong="H1270"\w* \w slippeth|strong="H5394"\w* from the \w helve|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w lighteth|strong="H4672"\w* upon his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; he shall \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of those \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2425"\w*:\f + \fr 19.5 \ft head: Heb. iron\f*\f + \fr 19.5 \ft helve: Heb. wood\f*\f + \fr 19.5 \ft lighteth…: Heb. findeth\f*

Lest the \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* the \w slayer|strong="H0310"\w*, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* is \w hot|strong="H3179"\w*, and \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* him, because the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* is \w long|strong="H7235"\w*, and \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* \w him|strong="H5315"\w*; whereas he \add was\add* not \w worthy|strong="H4941"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, inasmuch \w as|strong="H3588"\w* he \w hated|strong="H8130"\w* him not in \w time|strong="H8543"\w* \w past|strong="H8032"\w*.\f + \fr 19.6 \ft slay…: Heb. smite him in life\f*\f + \fr 19.6 \ft in…: Heb. from yesterday the third day\f*
Wherefore I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w separate|strong="H0914"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* for thee.

And if the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w enlarge|strong="H7337"\w* thy \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*, as he hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which he \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*;

If thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* all these \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w ever|strong="H3117"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*; then shalt thou \w add|strong="H3254"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* more for thee, beside these \w three|strong="H7969"\w*:

That \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* be not \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w in|strong="H7130"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and \add so\add* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* be upon thee.

¶ But if any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for him, and rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against him, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him \w mortally|strong="H5315"\w* that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, and \w fleeth|strong="H5127"\w* into \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of \w these|strong="H0411"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*:\f + \fr 19.11 \ft mortally: Heb. in life\f*

Then the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* and \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* him thence, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* him into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w avenger|strong="H1350"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, that he may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* him, but thou shalt put \w away|strong="H1197"\w* \add the guilt of\add* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that it may go \w well|strong="H2895"\w* with thee.

¶ Thou shalt not \w remove|strong="H5253"\w* thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H7453"\w* \w landmark|strong="H1366"\w*, which they of old \w time|strong="H7223"\w* have \w set|strong="H1379"\w* in thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, which thou shalt \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

¶ \w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* shall not rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for any \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, or for any \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, in any \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* that he \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w*: at the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, or at the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w*, shall the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* be \w established|strong="H6965"\w*.

¶ If a \w false|strong="H2555"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* against him \add that which is\add* \w wrong|strong="H5627"\w*;\f + \fr 19.16 \ft that…: or, falling away\f*

Then \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, between whom the \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* \add is\add*, shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, which shall be in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*;

And the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* shall make \w diligent|strong="H3190"\w* \w inquisition|strong="H1875"\w*: and, behold, \add if\add* the \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \add be\add* a \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w*, \add and\add* hath \w testified|strong="H6030"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* against his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*;

Then shall ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto him, as he had \w thought|strong="H2161"\w* to have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*: so shalt thou \w put|strong="H1197"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w away|strong="H1197"\w* from \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

And those which \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, and shall \w henceforth|strong="H3254"\w* \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* no more \w any|strong="H1697"\w* such \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* you.

And thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall not \w pity|strong="H2347"\w*; \add but\add* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \add shall go\add* for \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* for \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w* for \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* for \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* for \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.
